text: Lebenya Nkoka (born October 19, 1982) is a Mosotho long-distance runner. He competed in the men's marathon at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==International competitions== {| |- |2016 |Olympic Games |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |align="center" | 95th |marathon |2:25:13 |} ==Personal Bests== Outdoor {| class="wikitable" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- ! scope=col| Event ! scope=col| Time ! scope=col| Venue ! scope=col| Date |- |marathon |2:15:31 |Cape Town, |21 September 2008 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Lesotho male long-distance runners Category:Lesotho male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Lesotho Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Lesotho Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2006 Commonwealth Games
title: Lebenya Nkoka
